description: This header file defines the API functions related to MLD (Multicast Listener Discovery) objects for the COSA Data Model library implementation. It declares functions for managing and querying entries in a data model, such as retrieving counts, getting entries, synchronization, and accessing various parameter types.

methods.name: Entry_GetEntryCount
methods.description: Returns the number of MLD group entries.

methods.name: Entry_GetEntry
methods.description: Fetches a specific MLD group entry by index.

methods.name: Entry_IsUpdated
methods.description: Checks whether the specific entry has been updated.

methods.name: Entry_GetParamBoolValue
methods.description: Retrieves a boolean parameter value for a given entry.

methods.name: Entry_GetParamIntValue
methods.description: Retrieves an integer parameter value for a given entry.

methods.name: Entry_GetParamUlongValue
methods.description: Retrieves an unsigned long parameter value for a given entry.

methods.name: Entry_GetParamStringValue
methods.description: Retrieves a string parameter value for a given entry.
